title: What impact did enlightenment thinkers have on revolutions? - Quora

response.answer_text: Enlightenment is inner revolution, understanding the freedom which always existed. One who has found inner freedom what interest he will have on external freedom. Revolution in world is power grabbing from one who enjoyed to one who suffered. One who has liberated himself from both suffering and enjoyment he will not be bothered about any political or material revolution.
The recent revolutions were usually enlightenment inspired. Other revolutions, such as the cross voyages were inspired by anti enlightenment. Generally speaking revolutions are good.
